Hey Alloran, Jason gave me Archangle to play, but I am not good at 
playing male characters.  would you be so kind as to play him. I 
think it would be better if you could play him. Thank you.)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: Shomin is grounded.  He cannot use the computer until 
Saturday.  So 
> anyone with plans having to do with his chars, please put them on 
hold.  He 
> told me to give you a message: STOP FIGHTING!
> 
> Id be honored to take over Tigerhawk for awhile.
> 
> :::Sharpedge/Jetstorm/Tigerhawk/Airazor:::
> 
> ::Sharpedge dodges the missle and shoots 2 missles, 1 aiming at 
> Bloodystrike's gun, trying to knock it out of his hand, and another 
one aimed 
> straight at his chest.  Jetstorm bursts into the sky, dodging the 
missles::
> Jetstorm: Looks like we got an aerial battle!
> ::He fires 25 rapid fire optic lasers and 25 energy blasts at 
Reptilica::
> --------------------------------------------------------------------
----------
> 
> ---------------------------------------------
> Tigerhawk: Its a long story
> Airazor: Id like to hear it.
> Tigerhawk: The Vok fused our bodies together and created me, the 
Vok 
> emissary.  If it werent for Tarantulas, i wouldnt have become a 
maximal.  he 
> extracted the Vok influence from me, right before his death(he 
doesnt know 
> Tarantulas is alive JP).  I died soon after, but for some reason, i 
returned. 
>  I became second in command under Liono Prime(remember RgDaN 
guys?), until we 
> walked out into the sunset, so to speak.  Now im back, but i 
totally accept 
> Iron Raptors command.  Recently i was split in two, bringing you 
back.
> Airazor: Wow.  A lot happens when your dead!
> ::they get some energin and have a drink::
